__e: But I know your mind. I turn my heart to no other.
If I do, sir, then you might make every effort to win my favor... to repair this patronage. For I'd then have the power to destroy you in not only one world... but in two.
I know I don't deserve any favors from you people, but if you let me go, I swear to God I won't say nothing.
But you and I both know that the horse whose sexual favors you are selling for upwards of £100,000 a pop is an imposter.
There came a time in our marriage when I had to buy her sexual favors with presents of one kind or another, usually jewels.
It takes a special kind of woman to sell sexual favors in the light of day.
Accepting the King's favours meanwhile I... Was sagen Sie?
At least you found the right party favors.
Look, all the money, all the time and effort, all the favors in the world cannot possibly equal what you took away from her.
